amendment.description: To clarify the intent of Congress regarding an exception to the initial residency period for geriatric residency or fellowship program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 935 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 935 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S8283-8284; text: CR S8284) To clarify the intent of Congress regarding an exception to the initial residency period for geriatric residency or fellowship program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 935 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 935 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
